embeds.title: Online Multiplayer using Steamworks Fix
embeds.description:
Online Multiplayer using Steamworks Fix
✧ Download & install the game from [FitGirl](https://fitgirl-repacks.site/nioh-2-the-complete-edition/)'s website.
✧ Copy the contents of (Nioh 2 - Complete Edition \ NoDVD \ Steamworks Fix) archive to your game folder.
✧ Launch Steam and log in.
✧ Run nioh2.exe to play.
✧ To create an online session find the STARTING POINT on the mission map screen and select the Torri Gate.
